WPFInstall1password.description: 1Password is a password manager that allows you to store and manage your passwords securely.

WPFInstall7zip.description: 7-Zip is a free and open-source file archiver utility. It supports several compression formats and provides a high compression ratio, making it a popular choice for file compression.

WPFInstalladobe.description: Adobe Reader DC is a free PDF viewer with essential features for viewing, printing, and annotating PDF documents.

WPFInstalladvancedip.description: Advanced IP Scanner is a fast and easy-to-use network scanner. It is designed to analyze LAN networks and provides information about connected devices.

WPFInstallanydesk.description: AnyDesk is a remote desktop software that enables users to access and control computers remotely. It is known for its fast connection and low latency.

WPFInstallbitwarden.description: Bitwarden is an open-source password management solution. It allows users to store and manage their passwords in a secure and encrypted vault, accessible across multiple devices.

WPFInstallchrome.description: Google Chrome is a widely used web browser known for its speed, simplicity, and seamless integration with Google services.

WPFInstalldrawio.description: draw.io is free online diagram software for making flowcharts, process diagrams, org charts, UML, ER and network diagrams.

WPFInstalledge.description: Microsoft Edge is a modern web browser built on Chromium, offering performance, security, and integration with Microsoft services.

WPFInstallesearch.description: Everything Search is a fast and efficient file search utility for Windows.

WPFInstalletcher.description: Etcher is a powerful tool for creating bootable USB drives with ease.

WPFInstallfileconverter.description: File Converter is a very simple tool which allows you to convert and compress one or several file(s) using the context menu in windows explorer.

WPFInstallfirefox.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions.

WPFInstallflameshot.description: Flameshot is a free and open-source, cross-platform tool to take screenshots with many built-in features to save you time.

WPFInstallgimp.description: GIMP is a versatile open-source raster graphics editor used for tasks such as photo retouching, image editing, and image composition.

WPFInstallgit.description: Git is a distributed version control system widely used for tracking changes in source code during software development.

WPFInstallgithubdesktop.description: GitHub Desktop is a visual Git client that simplifies collaboration on GitHub repositories with an easy-to-use interface.

WPFInstallgreenshot.description: Greenshot is a light-weight screenshot software tool with built-in image editor and customizable capture options.

WPFInstallitunes.description: iTunes is a media player, media library, and online radio broadcaster application developed by Apple Inc.

WPFInstalllocalsend.description: An open source cross-platform alternative to AirDrop.

WPFInstallmicrosoft365.description: Microsoft 365 is a product family of productivity software, collaboration and cloud-based services owned by Microsoft.

WPFInstallnanazip.description: NanaZip is a fast and efficient file compression and decompression tool.

WPFInstallnaps2.description: NAPS2 is a document scanning application that simplifies the process of creating electronic documents.

WPFInstallnmap.description: Nmap (Network Mapper) is an open-source tool for network exploration and security auditing. It discovers devices on a network and provides information about their ports and services.

WPFInstallnotepadplusplus.description: Notepad++ is a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports several languages.

WPFInstallonedrive.description: OneDrive is a cloud storage service provided by Microsoft, allowing users to store and share files securely across devices.

WPFInstallOpenVPN.description: OpenVPN Connect is an open-source VPN client that allows you to connect securely to a VPN server. It provides a secure and encrypted connection for protecting your online privacy.

WPFInstallPaintdotnet.description: Paint.net is a free image and photo editing software for Windows. It features an intuitive user interface and supports a wide range of powerful editing tools.

WPFInstallpowershell.description: PowerShell is a task automation framework and scripting language designed for system administrators, offering powerful command-line capabilities.

WPFInstallpowertoys.description: PowerToys is a set of utilities for power users to enhance productivity, featuring tools like FancyZones, PowerRename, and more.

WPFInstallrufus.description: Rufus is a utility that helps format and create bootable USB flash drives, such as USB keys/pendrives, memory sticks, etc.

WPFInstallsysinternalssuite.description: The Sysinternals Troubleshooting Utilities have been rolled up into a single Suite of tools.

WPFInstallteams.description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that integrates with Office 365 and offers chat, video conferencing, file sharing, and more.

WPFInstallterminal.description: Windows Terminal is a modern, fast, and efficient terminal application for command-line users, supporting multiple tabs, panes, and more.

WPFInstalltodo.description: Microsoft To Do is a cloud-based task management application. It allows users to manage their tasks from a smartphone, tablet and computer.

WPFInstallupscayl.description: Free and Open Source AI Image Upscaler for Linux, MacOS and Windows built with Linux-First philosophy.

WPFInstallvlc.description: VLC Media Player is a free and open-source multimedia player that supports a wide range of audio and video formats. It is known for its versatility and cross-platform compatibility.

WPFInstallvscode.description: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor with support for multiple programming languages.

WPFInstallwinscp.description: WinSCP is a free and open-source file manager, SSH File Transfer Protocol, File Transfer Protocol, WebDAV, Amazon S3, and secure copy protocol client for Microsoft Windows.

WPFInstallwireshark.description: Wireshark is a widely-used open-source network protocol analyzer. It allows users to capture and analyze network traffic in real-time, providing detailed insights into network activities.

WPFInstallzohocliq.description: Zoho Cliq is a communication platform with chat, video, file sharing, task management.

WPFInstallzoom.description: Zoom is a popular video conferencing and web conferencing service for online meetings, webinars, and collaborative projects.
